name: I Am Dice
description:
In "I Am Dice", the game takes place in a little children's room, where the goal is to collect all dots, solve tasks and become the golden dice! Roll your way through a children's room and find all the hidden secrets!

We recommend playing "I am Dice" with a controller!

Download our game for better Performance!

Controls:

Controller:

Look into screenshots / Main Menu

Mouser & Keyboard:

  • WASD - Move
  • SPACE/Left Mouse - Jump
  • R - Reset
  • Mousewheel - Zoom
  • Right Mouse - Camera Rotation
